pages.title: ⤝ Seven of Swords ⤝
pages.text: Spirit of Unstable Effort$(br)     ☽ Moon in ♒ Aquarius

An overgrown dark field where seven swords are stuck in the ground, only their hilts are seen above the vegetation.$(br)  They await for whoever hid them there to come back, and finally wield them again to execute a treacherous plan.$(br)  Rather than dutifully following the process, people may look for alternative ways to resolve their problem quickly so they can move towards their goals.$(br)  Using our intuition and strategy sometimes we can

bring our attention to the few tasks that will move us closer to our goals, even if conflict or deception may be involved.$(br)  Like the swords scattered on the field, the parts that make up our lives are often isolated from each other. We can work with that and attempt something new.$(br)  Though keep in mind, some situations simply cannot be solved with trickery, and these will prove futile. Sometimes you just have to face what has to be faced.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Difficult effort, struggle, annoyance, attempts to see things more clearly.$(br)  A wish for a new strategy even if it may fail.$(br)  The need to define yourself, your plans, your position.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Individuality. Personal efforts being rewarded.$(br)  Counsel, advice. Clearing away obstacles.
